Equipment.title: Equipment
Equipment.description: Represents a piece of equipment in the Green Box network.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Equipment entity. This is the document ID.

status.description: The current status of the equipment (e.g., 'online', 'offline', 'maintenance', 'error').

definition.description: Stores equipment information. The `equipmentId` from the path is used as the document ID and should match the 'id' field within the document.

params.name: equipmentId
params.description: The unique identifier for the equipment.
